DDRPHY
======

Register Listing for DDRPHY
---------------------------

+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| Register                                                       | Address                                        |
+================================================================+================================================+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_RST <DDRPHY_RST>`                                 | :ref:`0xf0009000 <DDRPHY_RST>`                 |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_DLY_SEL <DDRPHY_DLY_SEL>`                         | :ref:`0xf0009004 <DDRPHY_DLY_SEL>`             |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_HALF_SYS8X_TAPS <DDRPHY_HALF_SYS8X_TAPS>`         | :ref:`0xf0009008 <DDRPHY_HALF_SYS8X_TAPS>`     |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_WLEVEL_EN <DDRPHY_WLEVEL_EN>`                     | :ref:`0xf000900c <DDRPHY_WLEVEL_EN>`           |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_WLEVEL_STROBE <DDRPHY_WLEVEL_STROBE>`             | :ref:`0xf0009010 <DDRPHY_WLEVEL_STROBE>`       |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_RST <DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_RST>`                 | :ref:`0xf0009014 <DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_RST>`         |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_INC <DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_INC>`                 | :ref:`0xf0009018 <DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_INC>`         |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_BITSLIP_RST <DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_BITSLIP_RST>` | :ref:`0xf000901c <DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_BITSLIP_RST>` |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_BITSLIP <DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_BITSLIP>`         | :ref:`0xf0009020 <DDRPHY_RDLY_DQ_BITSLIP>`     |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_WDLY_DQ_BITSLIP_RST <DDRPHY_WDLY_DQ_BITSLIP_RST>` | :ref:`0xf0009024 <DDRPHY_WDLY_DQ_BITSLIP_RST>` |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_WDLY_DQ_BITSLIP <DDRPHY_WDLY_DQ_BITSLIP>`         | :ref:`0xf0009028 <DDRPHY_WDLY_DQ_BITSLIP>`     |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_RDPHASE <DDRPHY_RDPHASE>`                         | :ref:`0xf000902c <DDRPHY_RDPHASE>`             |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| :ref:`DDRPHY_WRPHASE <DDRPHY_WRPHASE>`                         | :ref:`0xf0009030 <DDRPHY_WRPHASE>`             |
+----------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+

DDRPHY_RST
^^^^^^^^^^

`Address: 0xf0009000 + 0x0 = 0xf0009000`


    .. wavedrom::
        :caption: DDRPHY_RST

        {
            "reg": [
                {"name": "rst", "bits": 1},
                {"bits": 31},
            ], "config": {"hspace": 400, "bits": 32, "lanes": 4 }, "options": {"hspace": 400, "bits": 32, "lanes": 4}
        }


DDRPHY_DLY_SEL
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

`Address: 0xf0009000 + 0x4 = 0xf0009004`


    .. wavedrom::
        :caption: DDRPHY_DLY_SEL

        {
            "reg": [
                {"name": "dly_sel[3:0]", "bits": 4},
                {"bits": 28},
            ], "config": {"hspace": 400, "bits": 32, "lanes": 4 }, "options": {"hspace": 400, "bits": 32, "lanes": 4}
        }


DDRPHY_HALF_SYS8X_TAPS
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

`Address: 0xf0009000 + 0x8 = 0xf0009008`


    .. wavedrom::
        :caption: DDRPHY_HALF_SYS8X_TAPS

        {
            "reg": [
                {"name": "half_sys8x_taps[4:0]", "attr": 'reset: 16', "bits": 5},
                {"bits": 27},
            ], "config": {"hspace": 400, "bits": 32, "lanes": 4 }, "options": {"hspace": 400, "bits": 32, "lanes": 4}
        }

            ], "config": {"hspace": 400, "bits": 32, "lanes": 4 }, "options": {"hspace": 400, "bits": 32, "lanes": 4}
        }
